meanings.definition: A compound containing iodine combined with another element or group.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed potassium iodide to treat my thyroid condition.
meanings.sent2: I spilled some sodium iodide on the lab table during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The iodide compound and the chlorine molecule walked into a bar - it was a salty situation!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an iodide bond, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The bright purple color of the iodide solution made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: A salt or ester of hydriodic acid.
meanings.sent1: The iodide in the salt gave it a distinct flavor.
meanings.sent2: She added a drop of methyl iodide to the reaction mixture.
meanings.sent3: Why did the iodide go to school? To get a little 'sodium' education!
meanings.sent4: The iodide ester was like a hidden treasure, waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The strong smell of iodide filled the room as the chemical reaction took place.
